answerText: complementation[10] In bacteria, another form of complementation testing involves using these small circular genetic elements discovered by Lederberg. The R one is used to transfer antibiotic resistance between organisms.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | Editors Packet 2 | 2 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This type of test is used to determine whether two mutations are in the same pathway, and for a panel of mutants of the same phenotype the results can tell you what the order of the mutants in the pathway is. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this effect in which crossing two different mutants causes recovery of the wild-type phenotype.
